directions: Place the whitefish, mayonnaise, tartar sauce, lemon juice, cream, hot pepper sauce, and black pepper into a food processor. Pulse until smooth, then scrape into a mixing bowl. Stir in the onion, celery, capers, and dill. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving to allow the flavors to meld.
ingredients: 1 large smoked whitefish, skinned and boned
1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste
2 drops hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste
title: Smoked Whitefish Spread
